body:
Hi Giulio,

Thank you for the offer. Here is how I use it: [https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/ladybug/blob/master/src/Ladybug...](https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/ladybug/blob/master/src/Ladybug_Export%20Ladybug.py#L135)

I just needed a property from the component to set the exposure for the userObject. Let me know your thoughts.

Thanks,

Mostapha
